item.title: Redis Pipelines
item.description: Introduction to Redis Pipelines What are Pipelines? At the very basic level Redis Pipelines allow us to send multiple commands to our server, have them executed and then read all the replies. If you are wondering why thatâ€™s different to how it normally works, think of it this way: We have a bridge, on one side of the bridge is all the commands we want to run. Our helper memorises a single command, carries it across the bridge and executes it.
